replies.author: 魍魉WTandWL
replies.txt_content:
请到Minecraft官网
登入正版账号，下载Minecraft.exe
无脑安装【先到C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data，删除.minecraft再安装】
再不行发整体截图给我
